title: Experienced Marketing Virtual Assistant
snippet:
We need an all round marketing superstar to help us with the implementation of some marketing strategy initiatives. 

We've just set up a website selling luxury silver collectibles and we need your help to start promoting these products and reaching a brand new market. There is pretty much no-one doing what we're doing ight now and we are very confident in the product. We just need to get it in front of the right customers now. 

We're a small, nimble startup and in these early stages we've got LOADS to do. We are looking for motivated self-starters that can hit the ground running and help with many different aspects of marketing  Some of the tasks that we'll be looking for are:

•	Email Promotions/Email Marketing Campaigns 
•	Setting up email autoresponders
•	Press Releases/Articles/Newsletters
•	Construction of landing pages
•	Creating Facebook contests/sweepstakes using different apps 
•	Social Media Management and Analytics - weekly reports
•      Link Building/SEO
•      Research tasks into competitors/similar company strategys

We need someone that has an itimate knowledge of the following apps and platforms:
•	Shopify
•	Getresponse
•	Facebook ad manager
•	Google Analytics
•	Buffer
•	Gleam

No agencies. please respond to this message quoting '12345jj6' to show that you have read and understood this message. No 'stock/spam' emails will be replied to.
